ValidationRule.description: This validation rule fires when the Funding Decision is "Extended", and someone tries to close the case with the blank values of Extension End Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EDRD', ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(EDRD_MOHFunding_Decision__c, "Extended"), ISBLANK(EDRD_MOHFunding_Extension_Date__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'MOH Review'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,'Cancelled'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Funding Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Funding Denied')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Funding Decision is "Extended", then the case cannot be closed with the blank values of Extension End Date.
